title: Ground News - 'Heavy Snow' Falling Down During NFL Game On Sunday
text:
Summary by The Spun (Photo by Brett Carlsen/Getty Images) Brett Carlsen/Getty Images Is there anything better than a snow game?The answer is no.We've got one in the National Football League on Sunday afternoon, thanks to the Chicago skies.Heavy snow is pouring down ahead of kickoff between the Bears and the Falcons on Sunday."Snow is starting to come down heavy in Chicago. üå®Ô∏è," the NFL tweeted out.Snow is starting to come down heavy in Chicago. üå®Ô∏èüì∫: #ATLvsCHI o‚Ä¶ Share menu More
